cutscene_intro.cutscene_intro:
SPONGEBOB,
YOUR RUCKUS HAS SPOILED MY PRECIOUS SLUMBER.
THEREFORE, I'VE SEIZED YOUR DIARY AND LEFT IT IN THE WORLD'S SCARIEST LOCALE.
TAKE THAT, SQUIDWARD

cutscene_outro.cutscene_outro:
DEAR DIARY,
THIS IS SQUIDWARD'S SCARY PLACE? MORE LIKE SCARY DELICIOUS.
I PLAN ON SETTING A PATTY-EATING RECORD. TIME FOR MOUTH STRETCHES!

instructions.attacker.body_mobile: TAP TO THROW YOUR SPATULA TO DEFEAT ENEMIES IN YOUR WAY!
instructions.attacker.body_desktop: CLICK TO THROW YOUR SPATULA TO DEFEAT ENEMIES IN YOUR WAY!

instructions.autowalk.body_mobile: TAP TO TURN VENTS ON OR OFF. USE THEM TO TAKE THE SAFEST PATH!
instructions.autowalk.body_desktop: CLICK TO TURN VENTS ON OR OFF. USE THEM TO TAKE THE SAFEST PATH!

instructions.jumping.body_mobile: TAP AND HOLD TO BUILD THE METER SO YOU CAN JUMP FARTHER!
instructions.jumping.body_desktop: CLICK AND HOLD TO BUILD THE METER SO YOU CAN JUMP FARTHER!

instructions.quicktap.body_mobile: REMEMBER TO KEEP TAPPING IN ORDER TO MAKE SPONGEBOB RUN!
instructions.quicktap.body_desktop: REMEMBER TO KEEP CLICKING IN ORDER TO MAKE SPONGEBOB RUN!

instructions.body_mobile: Tap wisely to set me into action. One button. One action. You'll probably mess it up.
instructions.body_desktop: Click wisely to set me into action. One button. One action. You'll probably mess it up.

intro_dump.body: THERE'S GOTTA BE PLENTY OF MESSY NIGHTMARES IN HERE . . .

intro_mall.body: THE FOOD COURT ALONE IS TERRIFYING . . .

intro_krustykrab.body: WAIT... WHY IS THIS PLACE SO SCARY?
